Hi! I‘m a master student at the Hasso Plattner Institute in Germany with specializations in human computer interactions and mobile & embedded systems.

I use this site as a repository for my university and spare time projects. Feel free drop me a line if you have any questions or comments on some of the projects.

Recent Projects

Lumino

Baudisch, P., Becker, T., and Rudeck, F.

Lumino building blocks allow tabletop computers based on diffuse illumination to recognize objects arranged in a three-dimensional structure. More...
